data.title: 11 - Chapter 4 PDF
data.meta_description: 11_chapter 4.pdf - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document provides profiles of several important Hindu religious orders in Tamil Nadu. It discusses their origins and histories. The Thiruvavaduthurai Adheenam was founded in the late 15th/early 16th century and is considered one of the most ancient and prestigious Saivite orders. It has made many contributions to Tamil literature. The Dharmapuram Adheenam was founded in the 16th century to spread Saiva Siddhanta philosophy and has emphasized the importance of Tamil. Both orders have had pontiffs who were scholars of Tamil and Sanskrit texts. The orders have played a key role in preserving Tamil religious literature.
